Description: The Logistic function which is zero centered
The tanh function which is not zero centered leads to better convergence [LeCun et. al., 1991]
References: Y. LeCun, I. Kanter, and S.A.Solla: "Second-order properties of error surfaces: learning time and generalization", Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, vol. 3, pp. 918-924, 1991.
